pjv.evolution.genetic

Class AbstractEvolution<Individual extends AbstractIndividual>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pjv.evolution.genetic.AbstractEvolution<Individual>
  • Type Parameters:
    Individual - Individual in the evolution
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Evolution

    public abstract class AbstractEvolution<Individual extends AbstractIndividual>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Abstract superclass for evolutionary algorithm. This class is to be inherited to create concrete evolutionary algorithms.

    • Method Detail

      • getPopulationSize

        public int getPopulationSize()
        Gets the number of individuals in the population used by the evolutionary algorithm.
        Returns:
        Size of the population

      • setPopulationSize

        protected void setPopulationSize(int populationSize)
        Sets the number of individuals in the population used by the evolutionary algorithm.
        Parameters:
        populationSize - Size of the population

      • getMutationProbability

        public double getMutationProbability()
        Gets the mutation probability used by the evolutionary algorithm. Meaning of this number is ambiguous, depending on the actual type of EA being used. In case of genetic algorithm, it may encode the probability of bit-flip mutation for each bit.
        Returns:
        The current mutation probability

      • setMutationProbability

        protected void setMutationProbability(double prob)
        Sets the mutation probability to be used by the evolutionary algorithm. Meaning of this number is ambiguous, depending on the actual type of EA being used. In case of genetic algorithm, it may encode the probability of bit-flip mutation for each bit.
        Parameters:
        prob - The new mutation probability

      • getCrossoverProbability

        public double getCrossoverProbability()
        Gets the crossover probability used by the evolutionary algorithm. This is the probability of selected the individuals to be crossed over before being mutated.
        Returns:
        The current crossover probability

      • setCrossoverProbability

        protected void setCrossoverProbability(double prob)
        Sets the crossover probability to be used by the evolutionary algorithm. This is the probability of the selected individuals to be crossed over before being mutated.
        Parameters:
        prob - The new crossover probability

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
